00009 Float_t ORAmi286Decoder::GetLevelOfChannel(UInt_t* record, UInt_t channel) 
00010 {
00011   if (channel >= GetNumberOfChannels()) return 0.;
00012   /* Don't access out of bounds! */
00013   return (*((Float_t*) (record + 2*channel + 2)));
00014   /* packed float into a 32-bit word. */
00015 }
00016 
00017 UInt_t ORAmi286Decoder::GetTimeOfChannel(UInt_t* record, UInt_t channel) 
00018 {
00019   if (channel >= GetNumberOfChannels()) return 0;
00020   /* Don't access out of bounds! */
00021   return (record[2*channel + 3]);
00022 }
00023 
00024 void ORAmi286Decoder::Dump(UInt_t* record)
00025 {
00026   ORLog(kDebug) << "*************** Dumping out Ami286 Data *************" << std::endl;
00027   ORLog(kDebug) << "Number of Channels: " << GetNumberOfChannels() << std::endl;
00028   for (size_t i=0; i<GetNumberOfChannels();i++) {
00029     ORLog(kDebug) << "Channel: " << i << std::endl
00030       << " Level: " << GetLevelOfChannel(record, i) << std::endl
00031       << " Time: " << GetTimeOfChannel(record, i) << std::endl;
00032   }
00033   ORLog(kDebug) << "********************************************************" << std::endl;
00034 }
